title: Defending Bodily Autonomy Is Real Child Protection
description:
The right is against kids’ freedom. The left is ambivalent.

title: Wagner Group Disappeared and Executed Civilians in Mali
description:
The Russia-linked mercenaries worked with Mali’s longtime U.S.-backed military to kill and loot with impunity, according to a new Human Rights Watch report.

The post Wagner Group Disappeared and Executed Civilians in Mali appeared first on The Intercept.
